Description: The date of the observation in YYYY-MM-DD format.
The target variable. The number of bikes rented per hour.
The relative humidity as a percentage (%).
The wind speed in meters per second (m/s).
The dew point temperature in Celsius.
The solar radiation in Megajoules per square meter (MJ/m2).
The amount of rain in millimeters (mm).
The amount of snow in centimeters (cm).
Whether the day is a public holiday ('Holiday') or not ('No Holiday').
Whether the bike service was operational ('Yes') or not ('No').
